title: Add the location 24,-97 to the Points of Interest
body:
> by 0x73761e6c2a742a5c15b4dd9daf86c8b9daab0da6 (Curat0r)

## Masonic Hall

![Masonic Hall](https://api.decentraland.org/v1/parcels/24/-97/map.png)

Should the scene located at 24,-97 be added to the Point of Interest list?

## Description

Dulce & Allies is a Publishing House collaborating with creators in a decentralized and digital marketplace within DCL. This location will be used as a Shop front for the NFT Community to house their artwork for sale. Follow @theadoption_io Twitter.

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=1e97c210-e2a7-11eb-a20f-d75df7f87ed8)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
